definition: taking or eating more than one's due (idiom); greedy and selfish
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
variant of 吃[chi1]
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
variant of 占[zhan4]
to observe/to divine
to take possession of/to occupy/to take up

sentences.english: Sponging and taking more than one's share and extravagance and waste on the part of cadres must be banned.
sentences.chinese: 杜绝干部多吃多占和铺张浪费。

definition: to damage the public interest for personal profit (idiom); personal profit at public expense/venal and selfish behavior
to use one's position for personal gain (idiom)
to misappropriate
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
official authority used for private interests (idiom); to attain private ends by abusing public position
to be corrupt/corruption/to embezzle
buying and selling of official positions
speculation and profiteering (idiom); buying and selling on speculation
tax paid in grain
(coll.) to gain profit (usu. by underhand means)
to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
the public/the state/society/the public purse
bottomless pit of desire (idiom); insatiable greed/carnal cravings are never satisfied and are a main obstruction on the path to enlightenment
to plunder the homes of the wealthy for food (in times of famine)/(of sb who has no income) to rely on others/to demand a "contribution" or "loan" from a business or wealthy individual
to stuff one's pockets/to take bribes
to prey on the people
